Body.Content:
We are announcing the connect to external sources in agents through Single Sign-On (SSO) feature for Copilot Studio. This feature allows makers to build agents in Copilot Studio that seamlessly connect to external sources without needing to manually authenticate every single time to external sources as it will happen seamlessly through SSO support. This feature will reach general availability on May 19. 2025.

How does this affect me?
When an end user initiates a connection to an agent utilizing external sources, all authentication and connection details will be handled automatically, using preconfigured data set by the maker during agent creation.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.
